sentences.en: As usual, the chairman's cultured voice was low - key in keeping with his old - Bostonian aplomb.
sentences.cn: 和平常一样, 董事长有教养的声音是有节制的,这和他那老波士顿人的镇静是一致的.

sentences.en: Carried off the difficult situation with aplomb.
sentences.cn: 镇静地应付了困难的局面.

sentences.en: Gates is one of the few to pull off both feats with aplomb.
sentences.cn: 盖茨是少数自信的成功者之一.

sentences.en: He delivered the speech with his usual aplomb.
sentences.cn: 他以惯常的沉着语气作了演讲。

sentences.en: He did so, moreover, with a nearly messianic fervor and aplomb.
sentences.cn: 并且, 他以近乎救世主般的热情与沉着来做这些事.

sentences.en: Master of all or mistress of all , aplomb in the midst of irrational things.
sentences.cn: 万物的主人或主妇, 坦然面对世间的混乱.

sentences.en: Ms Sharpe handled their questions with great aplomb.
sentences.cn: 夏普女士镇定自若地回答了他们的问题。

sentences.en: She performs the duties of a princess with great aplomb.
sentences.cn: 她泰然自若地履行王妃的职责.

sentences.en: She sang several songs, handling herself with the aplomb of a professional entertainer.
sentences.cn: 她唱了一首又一首, 泰然自若地像个专业的艺人.

sentences.en: The hard - working Milanese run their busy metropolis with efficiency and aplomb.
sentences.cn: 勤劳的米兰人平静、高效地奔走在繁忙的都市.

sentences.en: The Reds took the lead after just five minutes when Evandro Brandao finished with aplomb.
sentences.cn: 曼联开场5分钟就取得领先,埃万德罗.布兰达奥沉着的打进一球.

sentences.en: The whole cast executed the production with truly professional aplomb.
sentences.cn: 全体演职人员以一种真正的专业精神，从容不迫地开始了影片的制作。

sentences.en: This rather bloodcurdling recital , delivered with the usual Achesonian aplomb, startled the British.
sentences.cn: 这种颇有点令人毛骨悚然的议论, 以艾奇逊式一贯的沉着自若的腔调发表出来, 使英国人为之骇然.

sentences.en: You move through each day with grace and aplomb.
sentences.cn: 祝您的每一天都这样美丽而安详.

trans.tran_en: If you do something with aplomb, you do it with confidence in a relaxed way
